fields.name: DisableGateway
fields.description: Property only valid for an Api Management service deployed in multiple locations. This can be used to disable the gateway in this additional location.

fields.name: GatewayRegionalUrl
fields.description: Gateway URL of the API Management service in the Region.

fields.name: Location
fields.description: The location name of the additional region among Azure Data center regions.

fields.name: PlatformVersion
fields.description: Compute Platform Version running the service.

fields.name: PrivateIPAddresses
fields.description: Private Static Load Balanced IP addresses of the API Management service which is deployed in an Internal Virtual Network in a particular additional location. Available only for Basic, Standard, Premium and Isolated SKU.

fields.name: PublicIPAddressId
fields.description: Public Standard SKU IP V4 based IP address to be associated with Virtual Network deployed service in the location. Supported only for Premium SKU being deployed in Virtual Network.

fields.name: PublicIPAddresses
fields.description: Public Static Load Balanced IP addresses of the API Management service in the additional location. Available only for Basic, Standard, Premium and Isolated SKU.

fields.name: Sku
fields.description: SKU properties of the API Management service.

fields.name: VirtualNetworkConfiguration
fields.description: Virtual network configuration for the location.

fields.name: Zones
fields.description: A list of availability zones denoting where the resource needs to come from.
